article_title: Obamacare Helps Slow Employer Health Costs Heading Into 2016

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Employer healthcare costs have yet to fall, but the rate of growth continues to slow thanks in part to cost management strategies, the move away from fee-for-service medicine and a larger pool of insured patients under the Affordable Care Act, new data shows. If employers make no changes to their benefit [...]
